configureIndicatorExtraction.START_PAGE_DESCRIPTION: Optimize your incident response and threat management with the Indicator Extraction Configuration widget in FortiSOAR. This tool lets you optimize indicator extraction by excluding certain indicators, thereby reducing false positives and improving overall efficiency. Key features include indicator exclusion, searching for indicators in the exclude list, adding custom indicator types, setting up indicator exclusion using bulk import, and setting up indicator type mapping.
configureIndicatorExtraction.EXCLUDELIST_CONFIG_PAGE_DESCRIPTION: Define indicators to exclude from the extraction process
configureIndicatorExtraction.EXCLUDELIST_CONFIG_PAGE_BULK_IMPORT_USE_: or click to use standard uploader
configureIndicatorExtraction.EXCLUDELIST_CONFIG_PAGE_BULK_IMPORT_FILE: File Content is Null or Invalid
configureIndicatorExtraction.IOC_TYPE_MAPPING_PAGE_DESCRIPTION: Map following fields with appropriate indicator types
configureIndicatorExtraction.IOC_TYPE_MAPPING_PAGE_FIELD_LOADING_ERRO: Failed to load fields. Please try again.
configureIndicatorExtraction.IOC_TYPE_MAPPING_PAGE_ENABLE_CREATE_FILE: Select to create indicators of type 'File' for each email attachment under 'Suspicious Mail/Phishing' alerts during the indicator extraction process.
configureIndicatorExtraction.IOC_TYPE_MAPPING_PAGE_ENABLE_ADD_COMMENT: Enable Add Comment for Excluded Files
Select to add a comment to the alert when a file is excluded during the indicator extraction process.
configureIndicatorExtraction.FINISH_PAGE_DESCRIPTION: As per your selection, following is the list of items to be excluded.
configureIndicatorExtraction.FINISH_PAGE_NO_FIELD_MAPPING_CHANGE_MESS: No change in field type mapping
configureIndicatorExtraction.FINISH_PAGE_SKIP_CREATE_FILE_IOC_MESSAGE: Skip creating indicators of type file from email attachments
configureIndicatorExtraction.FINISH_PAGE_SKIP_EXCLUDED_FILE_COMMENT_M: Skip adding comments for excluded files
